title: NetBird
author: Marcus Quinn <marcus@marcusquinn.com>
description: Self-hosted WireGuard mesh VPN with SSO, MFA, and granular access controls. Connect devices into a secure peer-to-peer overlay network.
tagline: Zero-config WireGuard mesh VPN for teams

STUN_PORT.title: STUN (NAT traversal)
STUN_PORT.description: UDP port for STUN NAT traversal. Must be accessible from all NetBird clients.

postInstallMessage:
NetBird is running. Visit the app URL to access the dashboard.

On first run, you will see the setup page where you can create your admin account.

UDP port ${STUN_PORT} must be accessible from your NetBird clients for NAT traversal.

<sso>Cloudron SSO can be added as an external identity provider via Settings > Identity Providers in the NetBird dashboard after initial setup.</sso>
